paper.title: A Probabilistic Remark on Algebraic Program Testing.

author.org: School of Information and Computer Science, Georgia Institute of Technology, Atlanta, GA 30332, USA
Computer Science Department, Yale University, New Haven, CT 06520, USA

paper.abstract: Abstract : A key step in Howdenu0027s method for algebraic program testing requires checking the algebraic identity of multinomials. Howdenu0027s solution requires evaluations in at least 2 to the mth power points for m-ary multinomials. This note presents a probabilistic solution which achieves small probability of error on 30 points.
